message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm the boss!
Not a good deal for me, I want more!
You're not the boss, I'm making the offer now!
You're getting desperate, but I'm still firm!
You're being too greedy, I'll wait for a better deal!
I'm not getting desperate, I'm getting smart!
You're not smart, you're just getting greedy!
I'm not greedy, I'm just trying to get a fair deal!
I'm not getting desperate, I'm making the final offer!
You're bluffing, but I'm calling your bluff!
You're not calling my bluff, you're just trying to take advantage!
This is my last chance, take it or leave it!
You're running out of chances, don't say I didn't warn you!
I'm not backing down, I want more!
This is my last chance, don't make me regret it!
You've had your chance, now it's my turn to take it all!
I'd rather get nothing than give you all the money!
